title: L'Elephant Vert
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Raw, Asian, Lao, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A spinoff of the original L'Elephant restaurant next door. Offers a daily changing, prix fixe, three-course raw "vegan" menu for lunch at approx. 120,000 kip and dinner at 150,000 kip. Note (Feb 2015): The "vegan menu" contains items with honey / bee pollen, as the staff is currently unclear on the meaning of vegan. Please update HappyCow of changes.
